Sentencas: Various Ni-LaxCe1-xOy composites were synthesized and their catalytic activity, catalytic stability and carbon deposition properties for steam reforming of methane were investigated.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Among the catalysts, Ni-La0.1Ce0.9Oy showed the highest catalytic performance and also the best coking resistance.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-LaxCe1-xOy catalysts with a higher Ni content were further sintered at 1400 degrees C and investigated as anodes of solid oxide fuel cells for operating on methane fuel.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-La(0.1)Ce(0.9)Oy anode presented the best catalytic activity and coking resistance in the various Ni-LaxCe1-xOy catalysts with different ceria contents.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, the Ni-La0.1Ce0.9Oy also showed improved coking resistance over a Ni-SDC cermet anode due to its improved surface acidity.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A fuel cell with a Ni-La0.1Ce0.9Oy anode and a catalyst yielded a peak power density of 850 mW cm(-2) at 650 degrees C while operating on a CH4-H2O gas mixture, which was only slightly lower than that obtained while operating on hydrogen fuel.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: No obvious carbon deposition or nickel aggregation was observed on the Ni-La0.1Ce0.9Oy anode after the operation on methane.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Such remarkable performances suggest that nickel and La-doped CeO2 composites are attractive anodes for direct hydrocarbon SOFCs and might also be used as catalysts for the steam reforming of hydrocarbons.
Titulo: A new nickel-ceria composite for direct-methane solid oxide fuel cells
